thread.section_title: starbike.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of starbike.com | www.starbike.com
thread.title: Rodrigo Barbosa

author: Rodrigo Barbosa
title: Rodrigo Barbosa
text:
I'm a loyal customer of this store. They always send me all I want to Brazil and does what I ask no question. the price are excellent. To become a webstore even better, they need offer some bike wearing like jerseys, bib shorts, socks, shoes and other things like this.
However I'm very glad with the attention and the excellent quality service and products they offers. No doubts it are only best sellers things
